import api from'./apiClient';// Get all notification/email logs
export const getNotifications=async()=>(await api.get('/notifications')).data;// Send email notification
export const sendNotification=async data=>(await api.post('/notifications',data)).data;// Get notification by ID
export const getNotification=async id=>(await api.get("/notifications/".concat(id))).data;// Delete notification
export const deleteNotification=async id=>(await api.delete("/notifications/".concat(id))).data;
